channel.title: CVE Feed for Rexroth -- IndraMotion MLC L25, L45, L65, L75, L85, XM21, XM22, XM41 and XM42 IndraControl XLC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rexroth -- IndraMotion MLC L25, L45, L65, L75, L85, XM21, XM22, XM41 and XM42 IndraControl XLC

item.title: CVE-2021-23858|2024-08-03T19:14:09.398Z -- rexroth -- indramotion%20mlc%20l25%2C%20l45%2C%20l65%2C%20l75%2C%20l85%2C%20xm21%2C%20xm22%2C%20xm41%20and%20xm42%20indracontrol%20xlc
item.description: Information disclosure: The main configuration, including users and their hashed passwords, is exposed by an unprotected web server resource and can be accessed without authentication. Additionally, device details are exposed which include the serial number and the firmware version by another unprotected web server resource.
